title: FS: 1908 Suhling / aka Cubs/White Sox Postcards - 2 Chisox available - pictures added
author: timn1

posts.post_title: FS: 1908 Suhling / aka Cubs/White Sox Postcards - 2 Chisox available - pictures added
posts.post_content:
hi all,

I have two extra White Sox in this set to sell or swap, which are way more difficult than the Cubs.  For some perspective, there are currently 72 Cubs graded by SGC/PSA - an average of about 6 for each player in the set.  But there are only about 2 each graded of the White Sox players (21 total). 

Mine are 
Eddie Hahn SGC2    $350
Frank Isbell SGC1.5  $300


I know it's a longshot, but I'm looking for the Cubs Team card, Sheckard, Comiskey, Davis, Dougherty  

I'll gladly swap for or buy any of those.   

Tim

Tim,
Are these still available? Sorry, I just saw them.
Steve
